page.title: 10My Village School,The Narth.
page.content: I attend The Narth Infant and Junior School.It is a small village school with 29 pupils and two teachers.It was built in 1910.There are 15 infants and 14 juniors.We also have a dinner lady,a clerk and a caretaker. In the main building,are an infant classroom,a quiet room for library and television, and a cloakroom.The junior classroom is a demountable. There are four outside toilets and a shed. My favourite lessons are Mathematics and English.We do a lot of other subjects such as pottery, religious education,science,history, nature,drama,goegraphy,games,health, art, needlework and music. School begins at 9am and ends 3pm for infants & 3:30pm for the juniors. We have a playtime in the morning & afternoon and lunch at midday.
